scripts.debug: cp ../webapp/contracts/development.json src/dev_contractsInfo.json && cross-env PRIVILEGED_ADDRESSES=everyone LEADERBOARD=ethernal-local-leaderboard MNEMONIC="walk oyster enemy scare wear enable today wire index arrow page dynamic" cross-env DEV=true node --inspect-brk src/server.js
scripts.debug:staging: cp ../webapp/contracts/staging.json src/contractsInfo.json && cross-env PRIVILEGED_ADDRESSES=everyone LEADERBOARD=ethernal-dev-leaderboard MNEMONIC='abandon tank soap whale staff shadow spy sail garlic artefact suggest volcano' ETH_URL=https://rpc-mumbai.matic.today BLOCKTIME=2 node --inspect-brk src/server.js
scripts.dev-prod: cp ../webapp/contracts/production.json src/dev_contractsInfo.json && cross-env PRIVILEGED_ADDRESSES=everyone MNEMONIC="walk oyster enemy scare wear enable today wire index arrow page dynamic" DEV=true ETH_URL=https://sokol.poa.network nodemon src/server.js
